issue.title: [Archery] Render-human readable table when using "archery benchmark diff"
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-9201](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9201). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The output of `archery benchmark diff` isn't that user friendly. It would be nice to get a human-readable table sorted by % change in the console similar to what's printed by the Ursabot bot
